text: Thomas E. "Tom" Saunders (born June 28, 1951) is an American politician. He is a member of the Indiana House of Representatives from the 54th District, serving since 1996. He is a member of the Republican party. He served as Chair of the Henry County Republican Party for 6 years and as its Vice Chair for 5 years. He also served as Henry County Assessor for 16 years. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Indiana House of Representatives Category:Indiana Republicans Category:People from Henry County, Indiana Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1951 births
title: Thomas E. Saunders
